blocks.subject: Results ENA TT
text: Attached is the final spreadsheet outlining hires/no hires.     Currently we have 15 selected for hire.       However the two with questions were discussed as good hires and perhaps should be looked at again (both external candidates - Tom Martin's group).
I will circle around with you today to discuss further - so we can proceed with offers with your approval.
Ps - our external candidates did very well.
